description: yes it plays music but only from main hd not externals , looks basic as hell and visualisations meh, nowhere as gd as windows media player, i like to sit and listen to music but the lack of visualisations means your screen is going to suffer, pogo is like linux gd but could be a lot better
Can't open it with a remote procedure call, can't open it directly. Stellar work.
summary: Responds only slightly better than a dead goldfish
